en.index:about:title: club.about
en.index:about:content: The Robotics Club was started to encourage IE students to get involved and learn about the latest trends in Robotics & Artificial Intelligence. At the same time, we represent the university in national competitions and gather students to work on exciting new projects. Our mission is to deepen students' knowledge and enthusiasm for robotics by hosting workshops, AI paper discussions, and real projects.
